trans-unit.source: Provides a user interface for selecting an image for a property in a property grid.
trans-unit.target: 提供可以在屬性方格中選取屬性影像的使用者介面。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ImageEditor> is a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor> that provides a user interface for the user to select an image for a property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ImageEditor>是<xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor>提供讓使用者選取屬性的映像之使用者介面。

trans-unit.source: When the user starts the editor, it displays an **Open File** dialog box that enables the user to navigate to a directory and select a file.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者啟動編輯器時，它會顯示**開啟檔案**對話方塊可讓使用者瀏覽至目錄，並選取檔案。

trans-unit.source: The file list is initially filtered by the default file name extensions for the editor.
trans-unit.target: 編輯器的預設檔案名稱副檔名一開始篩選檔案清單。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses an <xref:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute> to associate the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ImageEditor> with a property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute>關聯<xref:System.Drawing.Design.ImageEditor>與屬性。

trans-unit.source: for access to unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 用於存取 unmanaged 程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.ImageEditor" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.ImageEditor" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The extensions to filter for.
trans-unit.target: 要篩選的副檔名。

trans-unit.source: The separator to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: Creates a string of file name extensions using the specified array of file extensions and the specified separator.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的副檔名陣列和指定的分隔符號來建立副檔名的字串。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the specified file name extensions, each separated by the specified separator.
trans-unit.target: 字串，含有指定的副檔名，每個副檔名以指定的分隔符號區隔。

trans-unit.source: The specified extensions indicate the file types for the open file dialog box to filter the file list for by default.
trans-unit.target: 指定的擴充程式表示開啟檔案對話方塊中的檔案類型來篩選檔案清單中的預設。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.ImageEditor" /> to get the filter entry from.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.ImageEditor" />，可以從其中取得篩選條件項目。

trans-unit.source: Creates a filter entry for a file dialog box's file list.
trans-unit.target: 為檔案對話方塊的檔案清單建立篩選項目。

trans-unit.source: The new filter entry string.
trans-unit.target: 新的篩選項目字串。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" />，可用來取得額外的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" /> through which editing services can be obtained.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" />，可以透過它取得編輯服務。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> being edited.
trans-unit.target: 正在編輯的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Edits the specified object value using the edit style provided by the <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Design.ImageEditor.GetEditStyle(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Design.ImageEditor.GetEditStyle(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext)" /> 方法所提供的編輯樣式來編輯指定的物件值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> representing the new value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，表示新的值。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the object has not changed, <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Design.ImageEditor.EditValue(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext,System.IServiceProvider,System.Object)" /> returns the object that was passed to it.
trans-unit.target: 如果物件的值沒有變更，則 <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Design.ImageEditor.EditValue(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext,System.IServiceProvider,System.Object)" /> 會傳回已傳給它的物件。

trans-unit.source: This editor uses a service provider to obtain any necessary editing services.
trans-unit.target: 這個編輯器會用來取得任何必要的編輯服務的服務提供者。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" />，可用來取得額外的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets the editing style of the <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Design.ImageEditor.EditValue(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext,System.IServiceProvider,System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Design.ImageEditor.EditValue(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext,System.IServiceProvider,System.Object)" /> 方法的編輯樣式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle" /> values indicating the supported editing style.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle" /> 值，表示支援的編輯樣式。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ImageEditor.EditValue%2A> method is not supported, this method will return <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle.None>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Drawing.Design.ImageEditor.EditValue%2A>不支援的方法，這個方法會傳回<xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle.None>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the extensions for the file-list filter that this editor initially uses to filter the file list.
trans-unit.target: 取得檔案清單篩選條件的副檔名，其為此編輯器一開始篩選檔案清單所使用。

trans-unit.source: A set of file extensions used to filter the file list.
trans-unit.target: 用來篩選檔案清單的檔案副檔名集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the description for the default file-list filter provided by this editor.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個編輯器所提供的預設檔案清單篩選條件的描述。

trans-unit.source: The description for the default file-list filter.
trans-unit.target: 預設檔案清單篩選條件的描述。

trans-unit.source: The file dialog box description appears in the file-list filter drop-down list box.
trans-unit.target: 檔案對話方塊的描述會出現在檔案清單篩選下拉式清單方塊中。

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of supported image types.
trans-unit.target: 取得支援的影像類型陣列。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Type" /> representing supported image types.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 的陣列，表示支援的影像類型。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can override this property to implement a different list of supported image types.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生的類別可以覆寫這個屬性來實作不同的清單支援的影像類型。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" />，可用來取得額外的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this editor supports painting a representation of an object's value.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出這個編輯器是否支援繪製物件值的表示。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Design.ImageEditor.PaintValue(System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs)" /> is implemented; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果實作 <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Design.ImageEditor.PaintValue(System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs)" /> 則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> that contains the image to load.
trans-unit.target: 含有所要載入影像的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />。

trans-unit.source: Loads an image from the specified stream.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的資料流載入影像。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> that has been loaded.
trans-unit.target: 已載入的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs" /> indicating what to paint and where to paint it.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs" />，表示要繪製什麼與繪製位置。

trans-unit.source: Paints a value indicated by the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs" />.
trans-unit.target: 繪製由指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs" /> 所指示的值。

trans-unit.source: To display the representation of the value in a typical property sheet format, paint within the boundaries of the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> contained within the specified <xref:System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示值的表示採用一般的屬性工作表格式，繪製的界限內<xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>內含指定<xref:System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs>。
